title: idi nIku nyAyamA
sahitya:
idi nIku nyAyamA shrI rAmA idi nannu brOva samayamu gAdA


anupallavi

  sadayuDu nIvani cAla nammitE nI hrdayamu karagadA paripUraNa kAmA


caraNam    vArijadaLa nEtra vArida nibha gAtra vAtAtmajanuta vara muni vandita 
suravairi rAvaNAsurahara shrIkara parihrta bhava bhaya para vAsudEvA
